species.name: magneton
descriptions: A linked cluster formed of several Magnemite. It discharges powerful magnetic waves at high voltage.
Delicate equipment can malfunction in areas inhabited by Magneton, which send out mysterious electrical signals.
Formed by several MAGNEMITE linked together. They frequently appear when sunspots flare up.
Generates strange radio signals. It raises the temperature by 3.6 degrees Fahrenheit within 3,300 feet.
It has about three times the electrical power of Magnemite. For some reason, outbreaks of this Pokémon happen when lots of sunspots appear.

abilities.name: magnet-pull
abilities.effect: Prevents steel opponents from fleeing or switching out.

abilities.name: sturdy
abilities.effect: Prevents being KOed from full HP, leaving 1 HP instead.  Protects against the one-hit KO moves regardless of HP.

abilities.name: analytic
abilities.effect: Strengthens moves to 1.3× their power when moving last.
